content.question: Based on the passage, anti-malarial programs in the twentieth century are broadly illustrative of health-care efforts to combat which of the following types of diseases?

choices.label: New epidemic diseases that first emerged in the twentieth century

topic.text: 9.2: Technological Advances and Limitations after 1900 - Disease

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
